Class ChartView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, DatabaseStockListener, ViewBase
    public class ChartView
extends InternalViewBase
    The chart view is responsible for the graphic display of the stock chart information.
    Author:
    Christoph Kaplan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
